snippet: In a zigzagging bus tour, Senator Ted Cruz flattered his audience with tributes to Southern culture and to the region’s growing political importance.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz's seven-state tour of Southeast in seven days is bid to solidify support in area where large amount of delegates will be in play in Super Tuesday primary in March; Cruz's message has taken on more combative tone, particularly with respect to illegal immigration, in part to lure spotlight away from GOP frontrunner Donald Trump.
lead_paragraph: In a zigzagging bus tour, Senator Ted Cruz flattered his audience with tributes to Southern culture and to the region’s growing political importance.

headline.main: Evoking Donald Trump, Ted Cruz Grabs for the Limelight During Southern Tour
headline.print_headline: Evoking Trump, Cruz Grabs for the Limelight During Southern Tour
